label.text: Street that can be used by Cidomo and is within an populated/built up area, pedestrians have priority
Street or track too narrow to be used by cidomo.
Set 'Bicyle = yes' if the path can be used by bicycle.
Road within a hotel or school or similar complex
A service road is usually maintained by the owner of facility the road is in
A path that is made up of steps
An upper class accomodation, often has a pool, prices range usually above 750.000 per night in low season.
An accomodation in the middle price range, better than a homestay but still not a hotel.
Prices usually range between 250.000 to 750.000 in low season
An accomodation in the budget price range, no single bungalow but usually detatched style.
Prices usually below 250.000 in low season
A Villa or a complex of Villas. Usually have multiple rooms and own cooking facilities.
A Hostel style accomodation, usually with dormitory. Budget-class
Convenience Store - a small local store usually selling a small selection of food items
plus things like simple first aid, household, stationery and car items
A shop that sells building supplies including pipes, screws, bolts and paints...
Shop selling gifts, greeting cards, or tourist gifts (souvenirs)
A ticket shop or box office. Sells tickets for public transport, concerts, events,...
A shop to get your normal clothes washed
Surf Spot / Surfable Wave in the water
Place to Practice and Learn Yoga and Meditation
A Cafe. Mostly for Coffee, tea, cakes, dessert, ice cream, small food, ...
A place selling beer and other alcoholic drinks; may also provide food.
Sells alcoholic drinks, no food. If the place also sells food than its a pub.
Townhall or Kantor Desa/Village Administration Office
Edit Clinic like Puskesmas, Pustu, Poskesdes
Edit Beacon - Structures for signalling on land and sea / like a mini-lighthouse.
Edit Scrub, Uncultivated land covered with bushes or stunted trees
